Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Malice began to chuckle softly.  Then it got louder, and loude, until it sounded a lot like Megatron, the Leader of the Decepticons.  One could easily confuse Malice for Megatron.  
 
He had to admit, she played her act extremly well.
"Oh you don't mean that, now do you?  You're just mad I caught on to you so quickly.  At least I didn't throw you into stasis lock and do something bad to you."
He let loose another manical laugh, before stepping out from behind the counter.  He stood behind Wolfblade, taking her shoulders in his big hands and gently tossed her back and forth in between his hands.  
"Your a good Maximal or Maxitron or whatever, too bad you were not online when me and my brother came online.  You'd be a real riot!   Oh well, live and learn.  Well at least you should learned a lesson from this."

shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@...> wrote:
OOC: Sorry I haven't posted lately. Just got out of the hospital. But 
I'm feeling much better now. 

IC:
Wolfblade:
She took the drink and downed it. She didn't budge. Didn't even 
twitch. However, she couldn't move to save her life. She smiled 
slightly and looked at him. He was spiking her drinks and she was 
just now realizing it. She was mad at him for now her motor skills 
went into stasis for a  bit. She took a deep breath and looked at 
him. "Malice, I like you. You are a good comrad in arms. However, you 
ever...and I mean EVER do that again, and once I can move again I'll 
terminate your programs perminantely." She couldn't help but chuckle. 
He got the better side of her and she was more frustrated at herself 
for letting her guard down.





"I am Des Wraith, the Archfiend of Flames.  I have slaughtered thousands of demons who opposed me and will keep doing so.  And not even the great King of All Demons can stop my awesome wrath!"

---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
